idea:
Loop dental is trying to create a low cost - high quality dental services ecosystem.


Mission:


High-Quality Dental Services at extremely affordable prices.

Low income/economically weaker people always aspire for a higher quality of life which fits in their budget. At Loop Dental we strive to fulfil that aspiration by providing a classy ambience, elite class feeling & good services to our patients at very affordable prices.


Loop dental is located in a Lower middle class-EWS area serving such aspirations since Oct â€˜18


How We Plan To Proceed?


1. Increase the reach

2. App for patients to find Dentists

3. Cloud-based application for Dentists

4. Standardized prices & processes


Innovations:


1. Modular Dentistry - Make Your Own Treatment Plan

2. Smart Subscription Plans


We want to extend such low cost, tech-powered innovative services to the low-income strata of the population throughout India.
name: Loop

idea: We're going to launch an E-Commerce shopping website. We're going to provide fastest ever delivery in E-commerce sector. Sites like Amazon, Flipkart, Snapdeal, Alibaba takes minimum 3-7 days to deliver but our business model is much different and more reliable than them, that we can deliver any product to any customer in just 3 hours or even less.

idea:
Born Bright Products Pvt. Ltd. is incorporated to commence FMCG business, operating in the beauty & personal care industry. 
Born Bright will be an Internet-First company which means that the company's products will be available only on digital e-commerce stores - the company's own website as well as 3rd party platforms such as Nykaa, Amazon, Flipkart, etc. Hence, Born Bright will be innovating the selling & distribution business model as a Direct-to-Consumer (DTC) business model.
name: BORN BRIGHT PRODUCTS PRIVATE LIMITED
